	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Virgo stared at the oncoming shots. She let herself drop backwards, swingin=
g back up with several flips, dodging the shots. She aims her gun at Aerota=
ur and fires off a dart, aiming for his chest.

Lee stops kicking the uncon=
scious Pink when he sees the shots coming. He shields his face with one arm=
 while he fires of 2 fireballs at Aerotaur.

Barrymore is struck by several=
 shots, taking them in her chest. She laughed some before opening fire. She=
 aims her gun at Aerotaur and fires of a missile, aiming for his head.

Bir=
dbot sidesteps right to left, avoiding the shots. Ducks down, ready to poun=
ce as his eyes change colors. Papertron flexes and runs across the ground, =
getting struck by a few of the shots.

Papertron: A FURRY MURRY! A MULTIPLE=
 CHARACTER POST!

Papertron converts to robot mode. He raises a gun and fir=
es off a grenade that lands near Aerotaur.

Birdbot converts to robot mode =
and grips his sword and whip tightly in his hands and begins a slow walk to=
wards Aerotaur.

Alba is hit by several shots. She drops to her knees to av=
oid being hit anymore. She aims her gun at Aerotaur and fires off a jolt of=
 electricity at him.

Depp lets several shots hit him. He smiles and begins=
 to approaching Aerotaur, gripping his katana tightly by his side.

McGowan=
 jumped over several shots, barely avoiding some. She smiles and picks Brow=
n and Pink up in one arm and presses a rifle to Pink's chest.

McGowan: Hey=
! Listen to me! Your 2 little buddies here will die, unless you give me you=
r precious little furry shit. I want the kid, now. You bring her to me, and=
 these fine pieces of shit live, you don't well, their in your memory, righ=
t? And no tricks. I can sense your tricks, and as soon as I do, their dead!=
...

McGowan narrows her eyes and waits...

  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: Rudra656@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, =
January 12, 2002 11:22 AM
  Subject: Re: I hope the Chivtrons are ready!


=
  ::Aerotaur:: 
        He looks up after hearing the shot.  He shakes his =
head.  "I've got to go, the new base will have to wait."  He runs up to the=
 bridge.  He looks around and dashes to the defense panel, he raises the sh=
ields and activates the autocannons.  They open fire on Virgo, Lee, Barrymo=
re, Birdbot, and Papertron. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              A=

subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
